meanings.definition: The state or quality of being milky.
meanings.sent1: The milkiness of the water made it look cloudy.
meanings.sent2: The milkiness of the paint gave it a soft, smooth texture.
meanings.sent3: The milkiness of the sky during the sunrise was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: The milkiness of her voice was soothing, like a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The milkiness of the clouds created a dreamy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The appearance or characteristic of resembling milk.
meanings.sent1: The milkiness of the fabric made it feel luxurious.
meanings.sent2: The milkiness of the lotion left her skin feeling soft and hydrated.
meanings.sent3: The milkiness of the coffee surprised him as he expected it to be black.
meanings.sent4: The milkiness of the marble statue gave it an ethereal glow.
meanings.sent5: The milkiness of the moonlight illuminated the path ahead.
